general-reqs.writing: Minimum 3 credit hours of Academic Writing
general-reqs.max-introductory: Students may use a maximum of 42 credit hours at the 1000 level. Of these, a maximum of 6 credit hours may be below the 1000 level.
general-reqs.distribution: Minimum three (3) credit hours from each of five (5) different subjects.

major-reqs.single: Minimum 36 credit hours/Maximum 48 credit hours in the Major subject. Major courses are those in Required Courses and Electives.
major-reqs.double: 30 or 36 credit hours in each Major subject or program, as specified.

info3bsc.name: Information Systems
required-courses: One ACS course at 2000 level or above
